mapper.select: select MASK_NAME(M.MBR_NAME) as MBR_NAME, PTR.PTR_CONTENT, PTR.PTR_STICKERS, PTR.PTR_RATING, PTR.PTR_CREATION_DATE, T.TRN_ID from PERSONAL_TRAINING_REVIEW PTR join PERSONAL_TRAINING PT on PT.PT_SEQ = PTR.PT_SEQ join TRAINER T on PT.TRN_SEQ = T.TRN_SEQ join MEMBER M on PT.MBR_SEQ = M.MBR_SEQ WHERE T.TRN_ID = #{trnId} ORDER BY PTR.PTR_CREATION_DATE DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
